item.title: Prompt Guide
item.description: You’ve arrived here seeking clarity on the why, when, and how of prompt engineering. This guide is your key to unlocking the full potential of our tutorials. Dive in to navigate the exciting world of AI communication with confidence and creativity. Happy exploring! Zero-Shot Learning Concept: Relying solely on pre-existing knowledge and descriptions to perform tasks without any prior examples. Analogy: Teaching someone to recognize a banana by describing it, rather than showing it.
